results.idea: Cross-sectional mean-reversion on return on assets (ROA)
results.description: Uses return_assets as a quality metric. Applied SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill(return_assets,365) to handle coverage 0.5. SUGGESTION1 not needed (single-field clear signal). SUGGESTION4 considered: return_assets has high userCount/alphaCount so signal is robust. KEEP_IN_MIND: implementation kept short (<7 operators, 1 datafield). Confidence set to 0.78 based on historical persistence of ROA mean-reversion.

results.idea: Revenue growth momentum
results.description: Momentum in revenue (revenue) via recent change. Applied ts_backfill(revenue,730) per SUGGESTION3. Used SUGGESTION1 partly by focusing on revenue growth only; revenue has high userCount so SUGGESTION4 applied. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Operating cashflow yield (cashflow_op / enterprise_value)
results.description: Combine operating cash flow and enterprise value to form a yield. Applied SUGGESTION1 using two datafields. ts_backfill applied to both (coverage 0.5) per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4: both fields have high userCount/alphaCount (cashflow_op, enterprise_value). Implementation concise. Confidence 0.80.

results.idea: Low leverage preference (inverse debt)
results.description: Prefer low-debt firms by inverse(debt). ts_backfill(debt,365) used per SUGGESTION3. Single-field idea to keep implementation short; debt has very high userCount/alphaCount so SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Accruals-driven return (low accruals long)
results.description: Accruals = income_beforeextra - cashflow_op (lower accruals indicate earnings quality). Applied SUGGESTION1 with two fields; used ts_backfill for both per SUGGESTION3. Kept ops minimal. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Inventory turnover acceleration
results.description: Momentum in inventory_turnover suggests operational improvement. Applied ts_backfill(inventory_turnover,365). Inventory_turnover has high userCount so SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Earnings per share momentum (EPS growth)
results.description: Use EPS (basic) growth to capture earnings trend. ts_backfill(fnd6_newa1v1300_epspx,730) applied per SUGGESTION3. EPS fields have moderate userCount. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Book-to-price proxy (bookvalue_ps vs enterprise_value)
results.description: Combine book value per share and enterprise value to detect value. SUGGESTION1 used with two fields; backfilled both. Both fields have high userCount so SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Pre-tax income surprise momentum (pretax_income)
results.description: Momentum in pretax_income indicates improving profitability. ts_backfill(pretax_income,730) used per SUGGESTION3. Pretax_income has high userCount/alphaCount. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Operating margin improvement (sales vs cogs)
results.description: Proxy operating margin: sales - cogs normalized by sales. SUGGESTION1 used with sales and cogs; ts_backfill applied to both. Both fields have strong counts. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Dividend cashflow signal (cashflow_dividends trend)
results.description: Growing cash dividends indicate shareholder returns. ts_backfill(cashflow_dividends,730) used per SUGGESTION3. Field has very high userCount so SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Return on equity (ROE) cross-sectional rank
results.description: Use return_equity as a profitability quality rank. ts_backfill(return_equity,365) applied per SUGGESTION3. High userCount/alphaCount so SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.76.

results.idea: Short-term liquidity improvement (current_ratio momentum)
results.description: Rising current_ratio indicates improving liquidity. ts_backfill(current_ratio,365) applied; field has high counts. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings quality: operating income after depreciation yield
results.description: Combine operating income after depreciation with enterprise value. Used two fields with ts_backfill for both as per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4: oiadp and enterprise_value have reasonable counts. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Capex efficiency (sales / capex)
results.description: High sales per capex suggests efficient growth. Applied SUGGESTION1 with sales and capx (fnd6_newa1v1300_capx). ts_backfill both. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Inventory reduction alpha (decreasing inventory as a percent of sales)
results.description: Decrease in inventories vs sales indicates improved turnover. Used two fields and ts_backfill for both. Inventory and sales have good counts. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Interest burden improvement (pretax_income / interest_expense)
results.description: Higher pretax_income relative to interest_expense indicates better coverage. SUGGESTION1 used; ts_backfill both fields. Both have good user counts. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Enterprise value momentum (decrease = attract value)
results.description: Momentum (decline) in enterprise_value may predict mean reversion. ts_backfill(enterprise_value,365) used. Field has high userCount. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Sales per share acceleration (sales_ps momentum)
results.description: Use sales_ps growth to detect accelerating revenue per share. ts_backfill(sales_ps,730) applied. sales_ps has strong counts. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: High cash balance quality (cash / enterprise_value)
results.description: Cash-rich firms valued more defensively. SUGGESTION1 used (fnd6_newqv1300_chq as cash and enterprise_value). Backfilled both. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: High EBITDA margin rank
results.description: EBITDA (fnd6_newa1v1300_ebitda) scaled by sales to get margin proxy. Both fields backfilled per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4: ebitda good userCount. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Low preferred shares dilution (low prsho)
results.description: Low redeemable preferred shares (fnd6_newa2v1300_prsho) signals less dilution. ts_backfill applied. Single-field short implementation. Confidence 0.5.

results.description: Increasing R&D signals investment in growth. ts_backfill(fnd6_rds,365) used. R&D field moderate counts. Confidence 0.56.

results.description: Retained earnings / equity as quality metric. Two fields backfilled. Both have strong counts. Confidence 0.72.

results.description: Rising working capital suggests operational improvement. ts_backfill(working_capital,365) used. working_capital has high counts. Confidence 0.61.

results.description: Sales divided by inventories to capture efficiency. Two fields backfilled per SUGGESTION3. Confidence 0.65.

results.description: Debt in current liabilities (fnd6_newqv1300_dlcq) relative to total debt measures near-term pressure. Two fields used and backfilled. Confidence 0.57.

results.description: Use spce (S&P Core Earnings) trend. ts_backfill(fnd6_spce,730) used. Field has moderate counts. Confidence 0.66.

results.description: Increasing deferred revenue (fnd6_drc) signals forward bookings. ts_backfill applied. Field has very high counts so SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Book value per share momentum
results.description: Book value per share (bookvalue_ps) increasing shows asset growth. ts_backfill(bookvalue_ps,730) applied. High userCount used per SUGGESTION4. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High operating cashflow to sales
results.description: Combine cashflow_op and sales to measure cash conversion. Two fields backfilled. Both fields have strong counts. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Leverage reduction momentum (decrease in debt/ebitda)
results.description: Debt / EBITDA decreasing is positive. SUGGESTION1 used with debt and ebitda; both backfilled. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Cash flow financing signal (cashflow_fin)
results.description: Positive financing cash flow (share buybacks or issuance) momentum via ts_delta. ts_backfill(cashflow_fin,365) used. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: ROA vs historical volatility (ROA stability)

results.idea: Inventory turnover vs industry (group-neutralized)
results.description: Cross-sectional inventory_turnover neutralized by SIC group to remove industry bias. Used SUGGESTION3 for ts_backfill and KEEP_IN_MIND4: fnd6_sics used as group param. SUGGESTION4: inventory_turnover high counts. Confidence 0.63.
